alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 10 at 8:00AM MST until November 10 at 6:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Winter Storm Continues Today Over Northwestern South Dakota... .Snow will lift northeast out of the area today with the heaviest new accumulations over northwestern South Dakota. Gusty northerly winds will create areas of blowing snow and greatly reduced visibilities where accumulating snow falls, mainly across northwestern South Dakota. Monitor NOAA Weather Radio for the latest information, forecasts, and warnings. ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Butte County and the Northern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
